snippet.title: My new game "Pow Vista" is on the app store!
snippet.description:
⭐️ https://discord.gg/PowVista
Hey everyone, most of you know me for my music, but I've been grinding on the side for the past two years to bring you something and guess what? It's finally here: "Pow Vista" is available on the app store!

Welcome to Pow Vista, the sickest skateboarding world out there! Brace yourself for an immersive multiplayer experience, where you can skate alongside other players in a mythic world full of legendary creatures. The goal? Level up your stats, snag rare boards and hoodies, and go on epic missions to save NPCs.

If you're looking for a dope gaming community, Pow Vista is where it's at. Join us on Discord and score a "Day 1" skateboard as a reward. Hope to see you there! ➡️ https://discord.gg/PowVista

- just gonna leave some more info on Pow Vista here-

Pow Vista - The Ultimate Skateboarding Adventure 🛹🤯
iOS App Store: https://apple.co/3loifD2
Google Play Store: https://bit.ly/3YYOtCq

Yeet into a mystical world where you can skateboard with legendary creatures and have a memorable journey.

Key features:
Massive multiplayer: Skate alongside players from all over the globe, make friends, and join forces to conquer challenging missions.
Mythical creatures: Encounter and interact with awe-inspiring beings as you explore the diverse landscapes of Pow Vista.
Epic quests: Help NPCs by completing thrilling quests that test your skateboarding skills and strategic thinking.
Exclusive Collectibles: Obtain rare skateboards and distinctive hoodies to set yourself apart from the rest.
Dope Community: Experience the welcoming and super-chill Pow Vista community! ⭐️ https://discord.gg/PowVista
